description.text: Pascal Second Per Meter ($Pa-s/m$) is a unit in the category of Specific acoustic impedance. It is also known as pascal-second/meter. Pascal Second Per Meter has a dimension of $ML^2T^{-1}$ where $M$ is mass, $L$ is length, and $T$ is time. It essentially the same as the corresponding standard SI unit $kg/m2\cdot s$.
